Package Model

Class SystemInfo

java.lang.Object
Model.SystemInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SystemInfo extends Object implements Serializable
where we keep data of all users and applications that was made by Developers also we implement Serializable to save the information we want in our file to have them even after rerunning our program. all the fields need to be saved in files
Author:
Fatemeh
See Also:
  • Serialization is a mechanism of converting the state of an object into a byte stream
  • Serialized Form
